DOC.brief_summary: A new Nobel Biocare implant , NobelReplace Conical Connection ( NR CC ) develop . The implant two piece design allow one- two- stage surgical procedure . The entire implant surface porous titanium oxide approximately 10µm thick ( TiUnite ) promote maintain primary stability , later lead secondary stability . NR CC implant use foundation anchor tooth replacement either jaw . Restorations range replace one single tooth entire arch bridgework . The implant also intend retentive element overdenture application . The present study design evaluate , insertion NR CC , marginal bone level bone remodelling implant sit various time point 5 year . Parameters soft tissue index , pink aesthetic score ( PES ) bleed probe ( BoP ) well evaluate together implant success survival rate . Using OHIP-14 questionnaire patient satisfaction assess . The result clinical investigation demonstrate clinical safety reliability NR CC use different treatment option .
